mapper.select: select channel_id as channelId, channel_name as channelName, email as email, phone as phone, enterprise as enterprise, credit_code as creditCode, access_key_id as accessKeyId, access_key_secret as accessKeySecret, access_status as accessStatus, creator as creator, create_time as createTime, modifier as modifier, modify_time as modifyTime from sys_channel where channel_id = #{sysId}
